We have class AsyncAppsClient. It likely interacts with an API for managing applications and variants, environments, etc. It's asynchronous client. Now produce JSON. Ensure no method names verbatim? The constraint: Do NOT list method names verbatim. So we shouldn't include method names in summary/keywords. But we can describe functionality without naming them directly. So avoid "add_variant_from_image" etc. Use generic terms.

    "environment control",

  ]
}
